title: $:/plugins/ajh/tiddlycopy
author: Andrew
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlycopy/icon": { "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlycopy/icon", "tags": "$:/tags/Image" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlycopy/readme": { "text": "This plugins adds the {{$:/plugins/ajh/copy/images}} copy button to the ''View Toolbar'' tab in the control panel. The copy button copies to the clipboard the title as a link if the path is defined in a ''tiddly'' field. By adding a ''tiddly'' field and path to an external page, it recognizes to display the page in an object frame and the copy button displays beside the title or gets listed on the more actions menu if it isn't selected on the View Toolbar. @@color:red; ''WARNING'' @@: Use of Tiddly Viewer to display untrusted web sites could be a security risk. This plugin requires the [[Tiddly Viewer|http://tiddlyviewer.tiddlyspot.com]] and [[Copy|http://copy.tiddlyspot.com]] plugins. Simply drag $:/plugins/ajh/tiddlycopy to the top of your tiddlywiki display, save and reload. This plugin comprises: * Templates * Stylesheet", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlycopy/readme" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlycopy/stylesheet": { "text": "/* COPY BUTTON SIZE AND COLOR WHEN SHOWN */ html .tc-tiddly-show button svg { height: 0.75em; } .tc-tiddly-show { fill: #ccc; } .tc-tiddly-show:hover { fill: #888 !important; } /* INLINE LINK WHEN HIDDEN */ .tc-drop-down a.td-tiddly-hide { display: inline; padding-left: 2px; } /* HIDE CORE TITLE AND BODY WHEN TIDDLY FIELD */ .tc-tiddler-title-hide + .tc-tiddler-title, .tc-tiddler-title-hide ~ .tc-tiddler-body { display: none; }", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlycopy/stylesheet", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlycopy/template/show": { "text": "\define s() $:/config/ViewToolbarButtons/Visibility/$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlycopy/template/toolbar \end \define title-styles() fill:$(foregroundColor)$; \end \define config-title() $:/config/ViewToolbarButtons/Visibility/$(listItem)$ \end <$list filter='[all[current]has[tiddly]]'> <$reveal type='nomatch' state=<> text='hide' class='tc-tiddler-title-hide'>
<$list filter='[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ViewToolbar]!has[draft.of]] -$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlycopy/template/toolbar' variable='listItem'><$reveal type='nomatch' state=<> text='hide'><$transclude tiddler=<>/> <$set name='tv-wikilinks' value={{$:/config/Tiddlers/TitleLinks}}> <$set name='foregroundColor' value={{!!color}}> >> <$transclude tiddler={{!!icon}}/>

<$list filter='[all[current]removeprefix[$:/]]'> $:/<$text text=<>/><$list filter='[all[current]!prefix[$:/]]'> <$view field='title'/>

<$button param={{!!tiddly}} message='tm-copy' tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Copy/Hint}} class='tc-btn-invisible'> <$action-sendmessage $message='tm-notify' $param='$:/language/Buttons/Copy/Notification'/>{{$:/plugins/ajh/copy/images}}
<$reveal type='nomatch' text='' default='' state=<> class='tc-tiddler-info tc-popup-handle' animate='yes' retain='yes'> <$transclude tiddler='$:/core/ui/TiddlerInfo'/>
", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlycopy/template/show", "tags": "$:/tags/ViewTemplate", "list-before": "$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/title" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlycopy/template/toolbar": { "text": "\define s() $:/config/ViewToolbarButtons/Visibility/$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlycopy/template/toolbar \end <$list filter='[all[current]has[tiddly]]'> <$button param={{!!tiddly}} message='tm-copy' tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Copy/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Copy/Caption}} class=<>> <$action-sendmessage $message='tm-notify' $param='$:/language/Buttons/Copy/Notification'/> <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'> {{$:/plugins/ajh/copy/images}} <$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Copy/Caption}}/> <$reveal type='match' state=<> text='hide'> <$list filter='[all[current]removeprefix[$:/]]'> $:/<$text text=<>/> <$list filter='[all[current]!prefix[$:/]]'> <$view field='title'/> ", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlycopy/template/toolbar", "tags": "$:/tags/ViewToolbar", "list-before": "", "description": "{{$:/language/Buttons/Copy/Hint}}", "caption": "{{$:/plugins/ajh/copy/images/copy}} {{$:/language/Buttons/Copy/Caption}}" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlycopy/template/hide": { "text": "\define s() $:/config/ViewToolbarButtons/Visibility/$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlycopy/template/toolbar \end \define title-styles() fill:$(foregroundColor)$; \end \define config-title() $:/config/ViewToolbarButtons/Visibility/$(listItem)$ \end <$list filter='[all[current]has[tiddly]]'> <$reveal type='match' state=<> text='hide'>
<$list filter='[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ViewToolbar]!has[draft.of]]' variable='listItem'><$reveal type='nomatch' state=<> text='hide'><$transclude tiddler=<>/> <$set name='tv-wikilinks' value={{$:/config/Tiddlers/TitleLinks}}> <$link> <$set name='foregroundColor' value={{!!color}}> >> <$transclude tiddler={{!!icon}}/> <$list filter='[all[current]removeprefix[$:/]]'>
